message: I think this is a fair starting point, Bob. What do you think?
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  This offer ensures we both benefit. Time is ticking, and inflation hurts.
Inflation is on my side, I'll take a bit more. You should consider accepting before it's too late.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer before inflation eats away at any chance of a decent deal for both of us!
You're running out of time, and inflation is killing your share. I'll take the bigger cut.
